entry.name: .eq
entry.description: Construct a new instance from an element in the current instance

argument.name: index
argument.description: The index of the element in the current instance to create a new instance from. If it's negative, the index of the element to be retrieved will be the size of the instance minus the absolute value of the provided index.

returns.return: A new zQuery instance containing one element
`null` if the index provided is invalid
